Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Once you've made some room, please
come see me. I've prepared some
<clr:0000>medicine <clr:ffff>that will keep you warm.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You should relax a little, listen to the
music of the <clr:0000>Stable Trotters<clr:ffff>.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Ugh, this weather's just the worst.<sp:5:0:0> But
welcome to Rito Stable anyway.
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>If you'd like to use the stable, please talk
to the shopkeeper at the center counter.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I meant to say <clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I did it again...<sp:5:0:0> I'm sorry.


It feels weird to be working somewhere
other than <clr:0000>Rito Stable<clr:ffff>, but I guess I need
to get used to it.
Talk14:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Welcome to New Serenne Stable!


Did I...<sp:5:0:0>say it right?<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease><clr:ffff>I just moved here from <clr:0000>Rito Stable<clr:ffff>, so I
always get the name of the stable wrong.
But this time, I nailed it!
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>This is a musical troupe that combines
<clr:0000>four different instruments <clr:ffff>into one
amazing performance!
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>No, that's not right. I meant to say
"<clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff>."

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Yeah... <sp:5:1:0>Sorry.


I just moved over here from <clr:0000>Rito Stable<clr:ffff>,
so I keep saying the wrong name.
Talk03:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0101>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>I said it right...<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease><clr:ffff>I came from <clr:0000>Rito Stable <clr:ffff>pretty recently,
so I always say the wrong stable's name.<sp:5:0:0>
But this time, I got it right.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>It was a stable much like this one, but in
front of <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>west <clr:ffff>of here.
The <clr:0000>big cold snap <clr:ffff>shut it down though.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>I think it was replaced by a newspaper
company or something.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff> can be really cold, so if you want to
go to <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>, you need to <clr:0000>prepare for
extreme weather<clr:ffff>.
Near01: Still not used to this place.
Talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Come back to Rito...<sp:5:0:0> *sigh* Come back to
New Serenne Stable whenever you like.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>It was a stable much like this one, but in
front of <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>west <clr:ffff>of here.
The <clr:0000>big cold snap <clr:ffff>shut it down though.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>I think it was replaced by a newspaper
company or something.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff> was always cold, but it's gotten
really bad. If you go to <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>, you
need to <clr:0000>prepare for extreme weather<clr:ffff>.
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Sorry to just keep going on and on when
the rain is already noisy enough...
Talk06: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh, by the way, please take this.
Talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you can't fall asleep, I bet listening
to the <clr:0000>Stable Trotters<clr:ffff> perform will help
you unwind.
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Or not. I think you're carrying a little too
much right now.
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh, you organized your things for me?
Here you go, then.
